alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 8:13PM CST until March 05 at 8:45PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR CENTRAL LEE AND NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 813 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Croton, or 11 miles north of Kahoka, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Donnellson around 820 PM CST. Franklin and New Boston around 825 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Nauvoo, West Point, Montrose, Fort Madison and Denmark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Illinois...southeastern Iowa...and northeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
